timeline.bodyText: Seems to be the wrong version here, shouldn't this be the placeholder?
timeline.author: tomas-langer
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -13,8 +13,9 @@
 # See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
 # limitations under the License.
 #
-build-tools.version={{buildtoolsVersion}}
+build-tools.version=2.0.2

replies.bodyText: Romain said this was intentional as it was "the version of the helidon-maven-plugin that contains the goal “dev” before we split it into helidon-cli-maven-plugin". And that this is used only for testing. We might want to follow-up on this, but I don't think it should block the PR.
replies.author: barchetta

replies.bodyText: This property is correct. It corresponds to the older version of helidon-maven-plugin that contained the goal dev, it is used for backward compatibility. Also note that this file is only used for testing.
replies.author: romain-grecourt

timeline.author: tomas-langer

replies.bodyText: Yes, this is a mustache loop ; thus the indentation.
replies.author: romain-grecourt

timeline.bodyText: Is the cli released separately? If not, this should be the same version as build-tools
timeline.author: tomas-langer

replies.bodyText: No change was made to the CLI plugin, so he left this version the same.
replies.author: barchetta

replies.bodyText: The CLI wasn't released as part of 2.1.1 because no changes were made to the CLI ; thus the difference in versions.
replies.author: romain-grecourt
